title: One Piece Eps 225-228
author: One Piece With A Lime
description: Podcast episode covering One Piece episodes 225-228, discussing the Foxy's Return Arc with hosts who are new to the series and enthusiasts.
notes: Available on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and Amazon Music. Covers the entire Foxy's Return Arc including Aokiji's appearance.

title: 225-226: 'Proud Man! Silver Fox Foxy!' and 'The Guy Who's the Closest to Invincible? And the Most Dangerous Man!'
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: Blog post reviewing episodes 225-226 together, noting that episode 225 had minimal content worth discussing separately. Critical of Foxy's betrayal after being rescued and the repetitive comedy.
notes: Blogger found episode 225 largely derivative with repetitive comedic devices. Compared Foxy Pirates unfavorably to Team Rocket.

title: Episode 225 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Comprehensive wiki page with episode information, synopsis, character appearances, trivia, and technical details.
notes: Primary source for episode details including air dates, credits, and synopsis.

title: One Piece: Foxy's Return Arc (Filler) - Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers
description: Article providing summary, recap, and review of the entire Foxy's Return Arc (episodes 225-228), noting it as a filler arc with mixed reception.
notes: Notes that Aokiji's introduction is the redeeming feature of an otherwise unpopular filler arc.

title: ONE PIECE EPISODE 225 REACTION!
author: BishsticksAnime
description: Patreon-exclusive reaction video to One Piece Episode 225.

title: Foxy's Return Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Wiki page providing overview of the entire Foxy's Return Arc, including episode breakdown and arc summary.
notes: Notes that this is an anime-only filler arc spanning 4 episodes.

title: Kibagaeru - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Character page for Kibagaeru with detailed information about his appearance, personality, abilities, and role in the Foxy's Return Arc.
notes: Details Kibagaeru's anime-exclusive role as antagonist of the filler arc.
